title: ISic030052. Contract for the sale of property
body:
1[Ἐπὶ .]
2[ὁ δεῖνα ἐπρίατο τὸν χῶρον.]
3[.καὶ τῶν ἐνεόντων κοινων .]
4[--- ποτὶ] Κότα[ν? ---]
5[---] καὶ τοῦ ὕδατο[ς ---]
6[τὰ ἥμισσα ἐ]ν τῶι χώρωι γ[---]
7[--- πὰρ? Φι]ντέα τ[ο]ῦ Μαχάν[ου ---]
8[---]τὰν δ’ Εὐάμερ[ος? ---]
9[---ταλάντω]ν Ἄμποχ[οι ---]
10[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]

1[...·]
2[.....................·]
3[·....................·]
4[---....]ΚΟΤΑ[.---]
5[---]ΚΑΙΤΟΥΥΔΑΤΟ[.---]
6[.........]ΝΤΩΙΧΩΡΩΙΓ[---]
7[---.....]ΝΤΕΑΤ[.]ΥΜΑΧΑΝ[..---]
8[---]ΤΑΝΔΕΥΑΜΕΡ[..---]
9[---.......]ΝΑΜΠΟΧ[..---]
10[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on Manganaro in Parola del Passato 1989, corrected from photo in Cordano 1984;
  • 4: Perhaps [....]κότα, an accusative participle referring to the seller's possession of the property in question?
  • 5: κα[.], M., but the iota is clearly visible in the photo.
  • 6: τῶ, M., but the iota is clearly visible in the photo.
  • 7: [.]ὐάμερ[..?], M., but the epsilon is clearly visible in the photo.

English translation

Randall Souza

...Kotas(?)...and the water...in the land...and the...of Euameros...talents. Guarantors:...

commentary

Tiny fragment, but the unambiguous reference to guarantors (Ἄμποχοι) suggests this is an independent contract and not to be joined with another existing text. It is written in the same hand as ISic 030051.

bibliography

  • 27.0651 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Manganaro 1977 1344-1349 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001410
  • Manganaro 1989 191 Kam. II https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002637
  • 1989 Dubois p.137 dr https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
